note¶

Note controller

class spam.controllers.note.Controller(*args, **kwargs)¶

REST controller for managing notes.

In addition to the standard REST verbs this controller defines the following REST-like methods:

  • pin (pin())
  • unpin (unpin())
get_all(proj, annotable_id)¶

Return a html fragment with a list of notes for this object.

get_delete(proj, note_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a DELETE confirmation form.

get_one(proj, annotable_id, note_id)¶

This method is currently unused, but is needed for the RESTController to work.

new(proj, annotable_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a NEW form.

pin(proj, note_id)¶

Pin a note.

post(proj, annotable_id, text)¶

Add notes to a annotable obect.

post_delete(proj, note_id)¶

Delete a note.

unpin(proj, note_id)¶

Un-pin a note.
